Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Takehiro Murozono as Kenya Kaji  Ken Narita as Etou  Mizuka Arima as Mie Kaji  Minoru Inaba as Principal  Hiroshi Naka as Caretaker  Isshin Chiba as Chief referee  Wataru Takagi as Backup catcher, Next Conan's Hint  Yukiko Iwai as Girl

sections.Anime:
- The names of the characters in the Funimation Dub are:
- Kenya Kaji - Kenyan
- Etou - Billy Jones
- Principal - Principal Evans
- Mie Kaji remained unnamed in the Funimation Dub, but was credited as Kenyan's Mom.
